Question: MPI Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MPI Corporation

ThermalAir Product Line

- Includes TA-5000A, TA-5000B, TA-3000, and TA-1000 Series
- Offers ThermalAir Chilling System with TC-100 Chiller
- Provides Thermal Test Accessories and Test Chamber
- Supports applications in Semiconductor IC Devices, Automotive Electronics, Aerospace & Defense, Telecommunications, Fiber Optic Components, Sensors, LiDAR, and Electronic Test
- Exhibiting at CES 2024, showcasing at Westgate Las Vegas & Las Vegas Convention and World Trade Center (LVCC) booth #1817 and #5677
- Also participating in DesignCon 2024, Thermal | Advanced Semiconductor Test event at Santa Clara Convention Center booth #1438
Summary_cn:
MPI Corporation

MPI公司

ThermalAir产品系列

- 包括TA-5000A，TA-5000B，TA-3000和TA-1000系列
- 提供带有TC-100制冷机的ThermalAir冷却系统
- 提供热测试附件和测试室
- 支持半导体IC器件，汽车电子，航空航天和国防，电信，光纤组件，传感器，激光雷达和电子测试等应用
- 参展CES 2024，在Westgate Las Vegas和Las Vegas Convention和World Trade Center（LVCC）展位号1817和5677展示
- 还参加DesignCon 2024，Thermal | Advanced Semiconductor Test event在Santa Clara Convention Center展位号1438展示
